item.description:
Come get pampered with a Complimentary Facial while enjoying a glass of wine & some appetizers and sandwiches!

I'm introducing a line of fabulous skin care products from BeautiControl that offers skin care treatment products such as Microderm Abrasion and Chemical Peels that you can use at home without the costly expense of going to a spa. And you get the same results!

The BeautiControl line includes skin care, cosmetics, repair, prevention, & spa products that are the finest and most scientifically advance products on the market today...and truly live up to their reputation. The products can help a variety of skin types including dry, combination, oily, acne prone, sensitive, aged, & more. There is a skin care line offers treatments for each individual age group individual age group: 20's, 30's, 40's, and 50's!

Beyond the basic skin care treatment, there are additional products that are guaranteed to deliver visible results in as little as one week or less. Some of the products include a Vitamin C Serum that delivers 20% of pure Vitamin C to your skin; an at home Chemical Peel that is awesome; Wrinkle Filling Creme that helps minimize the appearance of lines & wrinkles; an at homeMicroderm Abrasion product that shows visible results with the first use; a prevention product called Vitamin C Creme with SPF 20 which totally blocks all the damaging rays and protects new cells; a Rejuvenating Skin Serum which goes down to the bottom layer of the skin and works outward.


NO OBLIGATION TO BUY! Just come and have some fun!

NOTE: For those that don't drink, coffee & tea will be available. B.Y.O.B., if you prefer to drink something else.

NOTE: I have animals for those that have allergies!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Complimentary Facial, Wine & Food
